global.noAdmin: ❌ | I don't have the admin permission to use this command
global.noUserAdmin: ❌ | You are not allowed to use this command
global.noOwner: ❌ | You are not the owner of the bot you cannot use this command
global.noGroup: ❌ | This command can only be executed in a group
global.mention: ❌ | You have not mentioned the user

images.meme: The meme is being downloaded and converted
images.token: ❌ | You have not put the API token in the configuration, you can go to the config.js file to see how to add it

play.no_song:
*You must put the song*

*Example:*
{5}play Miley Cyrus - Flowers
play.download: I'm looking for and downloading the song!
play.error: There was an error playing the music

lang.noLang: ❌ | You have not specified the language
lang.errorExisting: ❌ | The specified language does not exist, the existing languages are: {custom}
lang.correct: ✔️ | The language has been changed correctly now the new language is: {custom}

prefix.noPrefix: ❌ | You have not specified the prefix
prefix.errorLength: ❌ | The prefix must have a maximum length of 6
prefix.correct: ✔️ | The prefix was changed correctly the new prefix is: {custom}

antiLinks.enabled: ✔️ | The anti-links system has been activated.
antiLinks.disabled: ✔️ | The anti-links system has been deactivated.
antiLinks.added: ✔️ | The link has been added to the allowed list:
antiLinks.removed: ✔️ | The link has been removed from the allowed list:
antiLinks.actionSet: ✔️ | The action for unauthorized links has been set to:

owner.defaultOwner: ✔️ | Now you are the owner of the bot if you want another user to be the new bot owner use the command {6}setowner
owner.noOwner: ❌ | The bot has no owner you must use the {6}init command to get that rank
owner.newOwner: ✔️ | The former owner has just relinquished privileges and now there is a new owner

automod.antilinks: ❌ | Error: I don't have admin so I can't delete links.
